resources.string: Welcome to the Oceans and Sea Life Quiz
You have to write your name!
The aim of this quiz is to test your knowledge about the earth\'s wonderful and mysterious oceans. It should be fun and informative. Good Luck!
You must complete all questions in this quiz. Each correct answer scores one point.
What Percent of the Earth is covered by Oceans?
What is the collective noun for Orcas?
Jelly fish are older than Dinosaurs. True or False?
Which of these Sharks are dangerous to humans? Check all that apply
Which of these depicts the animal fondly known as a \"sea cow\"?
What colour is an Octopus\' blood?
What is the name of this fish?
You\'re a real Master of the Sea!
But you\'ll need a little more practice before you\re ready to sail solo!
Unlucky captain. Better luck next time!
